MetaDataVersion.Name: Study 1234, Data Definitions
MetaDataVersion.def:ComputationMethod: Sum all mean blood pressure readings for visits 0, 1, and 2 and divide by the total number of readings

ItemGroupDef.Name: DM
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: TA
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Trial Arms
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One Record per Element for each Arm

ItemGroupDef.Name: TV
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Trial Visits
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One Record per Visit per Arm

ItemGroupDef.Name: EX
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per constant dosing interval per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: CM
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Concomitant Medications
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: SU
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Substance Use
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per substance use type per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: AE
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Adverse Events
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: DS
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per disposition status or protocol milestone per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: MH
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Medical History
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: EG
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: ECG Test Results
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: IE
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: LB
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Laboratory Tests
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per lab test per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: PE
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Physical Examination
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: VS
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Vital Signs
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per subject per vital sign

ItemGroupDef.Name: CO
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per comment per subject

ItemDef.Name: AEENDY
ItemDef.Comment: Event to day - relative to study baseline/first active day.
ItemDef.def:Label: STUDY DAY OF END OF EVENT

ItemDef.Name: AESTDY
ItemDef.Comment: Event from day - relative to study baseline/first active day
ItemDef.def:Label: STUDY DAY OF START OF EVENT

ItemDef.Name: AETERM
ItemDef.def:Label: REPORTED TERM FOR THE ADVERSE EVENT

ItemDef.Name: CMENDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Concomitant Medication CRF Page 10, Concomitant Medication CRF Page 35
ItemDef.def:Label: END DATE/TIME OF MEDICATION

ItemDef.Name: CMENDY
ItemDef.Comment: Study day of end of medication
ItemDef.def:Label: STUDY DAY OF END OF MEDICATION

ItemDef.Name: CMSTDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Concomitant Medication CRF Page 10, Concomitant Medication CRF Page 35
ItemDef.def:Label: START DATE/TIME OF MEDICATION

ItemDef.Name: CMSTDY
ItemDef.Comment: Study day of start of medication
ItemDef.def:Label: STUDY DAY OF START OF MEDICATION

ItemDef.Name: CMTRT
ItemDef.Comment: Concomitant Medication CRF Page 10, Concomitant Medication CRF Page 35
ItemDef.def:Label: REPORTED NAME OF DRUG, MED, OR THERAPY

ItemDef.Name: COEVAL
ItemDef.Comment: EVALUATOR, USED TO DESCRIBE THE ORIGINATOR OF THE COMMENT

ItemDef.Name: AGE
ItemDef.Comment: AGE IN AGEU AT REFERENCE DATE/TIME
ItemDef.def:Label: AGE IN AGEU AT REFERENCE DATE/TIME

ItemDef.Name: DSDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Disposition CRF Page 4, Disposition CRF Page 37
ItemDef.def:Label: DATE/TIME OF COLLECTION

ItemDef.Name: DSTERM
ItemDef.Comment: Disposition CRF Page 4, Disposition CRF Page 37
ItemDef.def:Label: REPORTED TERM FOR THE DISPOSITION EVENT

ItemDef.Name: EGORRES
ItemDef.Comment: RESULT OR FINDING IN ORIGINAL UNITS
ItemDef.def:Label: RESULT OR FINDING IN ORIGINAL UNITS

ItemDef.Name: EGTESTCD
ItemDef.Comment: ECG TEST OR EXAMINATION SHORT NAME
ItemDef.def:Label: ECG TEST OR EXAMINATION SHORT NAME

ItemDef.Name: IEDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 2, Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 3
ItemDef.def:Label: DATE/TIME OF COLLECTION

ItemDef.Name: IEORRES
ItemDef.Comment: Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 2, Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 3
ItemDef.def:Label: CRITERION MET

ItemDef.Name: IETEST
ItemDef.Comment: Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 2, Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 3
ItemDef.def:Label: EXCEPTION CRITERION

ItemDef.Name: IETESTCD
ItemDef.Comment: Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 2, Inclusion/Exclusion Exceptions CRF Page 3
ItemDef.def:Label: EXCEPTION CRITERION SHORT NAME

ItemDef.Name: LBDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Laboratory Tests CRF Page 9, Laboratory Tests CRF Page 11
ItemDef.def:Label: DATE/TIME OF SPECIMEN COLLECTION

ItemDef.Name: LBORNRHI
ItemDef.Comment: NORMAL RANGE UPPER LIMIT IN ORIG UNITS
ItemDef.def:Label: NORMAL RANGE UPPER LIMIT IN ORIG UNITS

ItemDef.Name: LBORNRLO
ItemDef.Comment: NORMAL RANGE LOWER LIMIT IN ORIG UNITS
ItemDef.def:Label: NORMAL RANGE LOWER LIMIT IN ORIG UNITS

ItemDef.Name: LBORRES
ItemDef.Comment: RESULT OR FINDING IN ORIGINAL UNITS
ItemDef.def:Label: RESULT OR FINDING IN ORIGINAL UNITS

ItemDef.Name: LBSTNRHI
ItemDef.Comment: NORMAL RANGE UPPER LIMIT IN STANDARD UNI
ItemDef.def:Label: NORMAL RANGE UPPER LIMIT-STANDARD UNITS

ItemDef.Name: LBSTNRLO
ItemDef.Comment: NORMAL RANGE LOWER LIMIT IN STANDARD UNI
ItemDef.def:Label: NORMAL RANGE LOWER LIMIT-STANDARD UNITS

ItemDef.Name: LBTESTCD
ItemDef.def:Label: LAB TEST OR EXAMINATION SHORT NAME

ItemDef.Name: MHSTDTC
ItemDef.Comment: START DATE/TIME OF MEDICAL HISTORY EVENT
ItemDef.def:Label: START DATE/TIME OF MEDICAL HISTORY EVENT

ItemDef.Name: MHTERM
ItemDef.def:Label: REPORTED TERM FOR THE MEDICAL HISTORY

ItemDef.Name: PEORRES
ItemDef.Comment: Physical Examinations CRF Page 8, CRF Page 31
ItemDef.def:Label: VERBATIM EXAMINATION FINDING

ItemDef.Name: PETESTCD
ItemDef.Comment: Physical Examinations CRF Page 8, CRF Page 31
ItemDef.def:Label: BODY SYSTEM EXAMINED SHORT NAME

ItemDef.Name: SCORRES
ItemDef.def:Label: RESULT OR FINDING IN ORIGINAL UNITS

ItemDef.Name: SEENDTC
ItemDef.Comment: End date/time of an Element for each subject.
ItemDef.def:Label: END DATE/TIME OF ELEMENT

ItemDef.Name: SESTDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Start date/time for an Element for each subject.
ItemDef.def:Label: START DATE/TIME OF ELEMENT

ItemDef.Name: SVENDTC
ItemDef.Comment: End date/time of a Visit treatment.
ItemDef.def:Label: END DATE/TIME OF VISIT

ItemDef.Name: TABRANCH
ItemDef.Comment: Condition subject met, at a 'branch' in the trial design at the end of this Element.

ItemDef.Name: TAETORD
ItemDef.Comment: Number that gives the order of the Element within the Arm.
ItemDef.def:Label: ORDER OF ELEMENT WITHIN ARM

ItemDef.Name: TATRANS
ItemDef.Comment: If the trial design allows a subject to transition to an Element other than the next Element in sequence.
ItemDef.def:Label: TRANSITION RULE

ItemDef.Name: TVENRL
ItemDef.Comment: Rule describing when the Visit ends.
ItemDef.def:Label: VISIT END RULE

ItemDef.Name: TVSTRL
ItemDef.Comment: Rule describing when the Visit starts.
ItemDef.def:Label: VISIT START RULE

ItemDef.Name: VSDTC
ItemDef.Comment: Vital Signs CRF Page 4, CRF Page 7
ItemDef.def:Label: DATE/TIME OF MEASUREMENTS

ItemDef.Name: VSORRES
ItemDef.Comment: Vital Signs CRF Page 4, CRF Page 7
ItemDef.def:Label: RESULT OR FINDING IN ORIGINAL UNITS

ItemDef.Name: VSPOS
ItemDef.Comment: POSITION OF THE SUBJECT DURING A MEASUREMENT OR EXAMINATION.
ItemDef.def:Label: VITAL SIGNS POSITION OF SUBJECT

ItemDef.Name: VSTESTCD
ItemDef.Comment: Vital Signs CRF Page 4, CRF Page 7
ItemDef.def:Label: VITAL SIGNS TEST SHORT NAME
